**2022-03-09 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **runtime: use MiniDumpWriteDump for GOTRACEBACK=crash on Windows** [#49471](https://golang.org/issue/49471)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/crypto/ssh: add NewControlClientConn** [#32958](https://golang.org/issue/32958)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: add pin keyword to go.mod** [#51021](https://golang.org/issue/51021)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **cmd/go: go test should always fuzz a bit even without -fuzz** [#50969](https://golang.org/issue/50969)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **strings: add Lines** [#51039](https://golang.org/issue/51039)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **x/tools/go/packages: add EmbedFiles and EmbedPatterns** [#50720](https://golang.org/issue/50720)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **bufio: Add finalizer to Scanner that warns if .Err not called** [#51299](https://golang.org/issue/51299)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
